Class StyleSettings

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.nokia.maps.BaseNativeObject
      • com.here.android.mpa.venues3d.StyleSettings

  • public class StyleSettings
extends com.nokia.maps.BaseNativeObject
    Defines style settings for venue and space objects.

    RoutingController
